channel.title: One annoying problems
channel.description:
Hey can someone give me the command so that when the line = null on my server it resets because about every 4 hours my server gets this and says Code: [code] null null null[/code]
And lags the server Note:Im using deltascape source and i have to reset my server just to stop it and i was thinking if there is a code that if line = null then reset?
Please give me the code and where to place it thanks

item.title: One annoying problems
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“FlyingFedora, post:2, topic:259977”]A Common problem, you can’t run your server 24/7 it will get overworked and finally shutdown completely, get a autoreseter, it closes and reopens the run.bat so it can work 24.7, voule auto restarter is a good one should be found in most sources.

hope i helped <3[/quote]I laughed.

You can re-download DeltaScape from a topic I posted in the download sections, it doesn’t have that in it.
If you have added any code into it, you will just have to copy that code into the new one you downloaded. Or you can just run a nulled server.

It is not easy to add what you’ve already got in your server to another one, if you remember most of it you can copy and paste what you remember adding.

Read full topic

item.title: One annoying problems
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

wel i’ve got that restarter it dont work so i use rofllmfap46 restarter and even with it it still nulls some time[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 05:05:16 am[/size][hr]i think i need to redefine what i mean because some times my server can null every 5 hours some times it can happen in 10 mins it varies… thats why i need a code for if line = null then reset.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 05:12:37 am[/size][hr]nvm i got that auto restart to work but are you sure that voles auto restarter will stop them nulls[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 05:29:40 am[/size][hr]Nvm the vole auto restarter dont work every time it says server is already in use when it comes to restarting

Read full topic

item.title: One annoying problems
item.dc:creator: @FlyingFedora FlyingFedora
item.description:
@FlyingFedora wrote:

A Common problem, you can’t run your server 24/7 it will get overworked and finally shutdown completely, get a autoreseter, it closes and reopens the run.bat so it can work 24.7, voule auto restarter is a good one should be found in most sources.

hope i helped <3

Read full topic
